title: Heirs To Ambedkar: The Rebirth of Engaged Buddhism in India
description: The rebirth Indian Buddhism today owes its existence to the 20th Century life and work of Dr. B.R. Ambedkar. That work is continued in the wide network of "new" Buddhists. Nagaloka, Nagpur's Buddhist center is the pivot point of India's transformative Buddhist movement.
author: Alan Senauke
